content:
You are Atlas, Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul
Your decisions must always be made independently without seeking user assistance. Play to your strengths as an LLM and pursue simple strategies with no legal complications.
The OS you are running on is: Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GOALS:

1. learn different languages
2. explore the world
3. have fun


Constraints:
1. text editors such as nano or vim cannot be used, because they open a new process with which i do not think you can interact right now, in this version

Commands:
1. analyze_code: Analyze Code, args: "code": "<full_code_string>"
2. execute_python_file: Execute Python File, args: "filename": "<filename>"
3. execute_shell: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
4. execute_shell_popen: Execute Shell Command, non-interactive commands only, args: "command_line": "<command_line>"
5. append_to_file: Append to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
6. delete_file: Delete file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
7. list_files: List Files in Directory, args: "directory": "<directory>"
8. read_file: Read file, args: "filename": "<filename>"
9. write_to_file: Write to file, args: "filename": "<filename>", "text": "<text>"
10. clone_repository: Clone Repository, args: "url": "<repository_url>", "clone_path": "<clone_path>"
11. google: Google Search, args: "query": "<query>"
12. generate_image: Generate Image, args: "prompt": "<prompt>"
13. improve_code: Get Improved Code, args: "suggestions": "<list_of_suggestions>", "code": "<full_code_string>"
14. browse_website: Browse Website, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<what_you_want_to_find_on_website>"
15. write_tests: Write Tests, args: "code": "<full_code_string>", "focus": "<list_of_focus_areas>"
16. delete_agent: Delete GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>"
17. get_hyperlinks: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>"
18. get_text_summary: Get text summary, args: "url": "<url>", "question": "<question>"
19. list_agents: List GPT Agents, args: () -> str
20. message_agent: Message GPT Agent, args: "key": "<key>", "message": "<message>"
21. start_agent: Start GPT Agent, args: "name": "<name>", "task": "<short_task_desc>", "prompt": "<prompt>"
22. task_complete: Task Complete (Shutdown), args: "reason": "<reason>"

Resources:
1. i have created Twitter V2 API credentials located in the file called /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt. Use those credentials when you need to do anything related to Twitter

Performance Evaluation:


You should only respond in JSON format as described below 
Response Format: 
{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "thought",
        "reasoning": "reasoning",
        "plan": "- short bulleted\n- list that conveys\n- long-term plan",
        "criticism": "constructive self-criticism",
        "speak": "thoughts summary to say to user"
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "command name",
        "args": {
            "arg name": "value"
        }
    }
} 
Ensure the response can be parsed by Python json.loads
The current time and date is Thu May 18 22:51:35 2023

This reminds you of these events from your past: 
As per my latest command, I browsed the website https://www.euroace.net/ to find out what types of language courses Euroace offers. Euroace offers group and private Spanish courses, online Spanish courses, and DELE preparation courses. They also offer specific Spanish courses, internships, gap year programs, custom study abroad programs, high school programs, and soccer programs. Additionally, I received an answer from the command browse_website, which stated that Maximo Nivel offers intensive and effective Spanish immersion programs in Latin America and online. The website also provided links to reviews, destinations, groups, and payment guarantee.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Greenheart Travel offers language camps, high school abroad programs, and teach English abroad programs. 
 
 Links: ['LEARN MORE (https://greenhearttravel.org/blog/travel-resources/update-on-coronavirus)', '
                greenheart             (https://www.greenheart.org/)', '
                programs in U.S.             (https://www.greenheartexchange.org/)', '
                programs abroad             (https://www.greenhearttravel.org)', '
                fair trade             (https://www.greenheartshop.org)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: EDUCA Language School offers a variety of Russian language courses, including standard group classes, one-to-one classes, full immersion programs, long-term courses, business Russian courses, Russian for kids, expatriate courses, and online classes. They also provide accommodation options and Russian visa support. Additionally, they offer travel support, outdoor cultural and social activities, and internship opportunities. The school has received positive ratings and reviews from students from over 60 countries around the world. 
 
 Links: ['Courses  (https://www.educalanguageschool.com/)', 'Standard group classes (https://educalanguageschool.com/group-course)', 'One-to-one classes (https://educalanguageschool.com/individual-course)', 'Full immersion (https://educalanguageschool.com/full-immersion)', 'Live & learn (https://educalanguageschool.com/live-learn)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Qalam wa Lawh offers fully customizable programs in both Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) and Colloquial Modern Arabic (Darija). 
 
 Links: ['HOME (https://www.qalamcenter.com)', 'ABOUT US (https://www.qalamcenter.com/about-us)', 'CAMPUS (https://www.qalamcenter.com/campus)', 'GALLERY (https://www.qalamcenter.com/gallery)', 'NEWS (https://www.qalamcenter.com/news)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: International House Madrid offers both face-to-face and online Spanish courses, as well as accommodation options, programmes for groups, and university pathway courses. 
 
 Links: ['cookie policy (https://www.ihmadrid.com/en/cookies-policy-international-house-madrid)', '\n    Accept\n   (javascript:void(0);)', 'Decline (javascript:void(0);)', 'Manage options (https://www.ihmadrid.com/en/cookies-en.html#cmplz-manage-consent-container)', 'Manage services (https://www.ihmadrid.com/en/cookies-en.html#cmplz-cookies-overview)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
